title-group.article-title: A Direct Test of the Permanent Income Hypothesis with an Application to the U.S. States

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2004 The Ohio State University Press

abstract.p: This paper tests the prediction of the permanent income hypothesis (PIH) that news about future income induce a revision in consumption equal to the revision in permanent income. We use time-series data from 48 contiguous U.S. states to perform the test. The empirical results provide some support for the PIH across states.
